title: FIRST Scholarship - George Fox University
Description:: The FIRST Scholarship is available to full - time entering freshmen at George Fox University.  You must have a minimum 3.5 GPA and have participated on a FIRST team during high school to be eligible for this award.

title: August C. and Margaret M. Cerku Academic Endowed Scholarship
Description:: The August C. and Margaret M. Cerku Academic Endowed Scholarship is open to students at Macomb Community College.  You must have a minimum 2.5 GPA and demonstrate financial need.  Additionally, you must be enrolled in a minimum 6 credit hours and have completed 12 credit hours.  Preference will be given to Macomb County residents and also to an honorably discharged veteran of the U.S. Armed Forces, or to the child or grandchild of such a veteran.

title: Advantage Business Valuations Scholarship for Social Entrepreneurs
Description:: The Advantage Business Valuations Scholarship for Social Entrepreneurs is open to students currently enrolled at an accredited college or university. You must submit a YouTube video of no more than five minutes that answers the question: "What does the term “social entrepreneur” mean to you, and how can you apply the spirit of a social entrepreneur in your life?" in order to qualify for this award.

title: Braintek Scholarship Program
Description:: The Braintek Scholarship Program is open to students who are actively pursuing a degree in an information technology related field.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.25, be a U.S. citizen or permanent resident and submit an essay of at least 500 words on how you've overcome an obstacle in order to achieve your goals in order to be considered for this award.

title: Arthur C. Pike Scholarship
Description:: The Arthur C. Pike Scholarship is available to students entering their junior year or higher and majoring in meteorology.  Senior students must have at least the upcoming fall semester to complete after the scholarship is awarded.

title: Phillips Family Undergraduate Scholarship
Description:: The Phillips Family Undergraduate Scholarship is available to undergraduate students and majoring in meteorology.  Senior students must have at least the upcoming fall semester to complete after the scholarship is awarded.

title: Bob Glahn Scholarship
Description:: The Bob Glahn Scholarship is available to junior and senior undergraduate students majoring in meteorology.  Senior students must have at least the upcoming fall semester to complete after the scholarship is awarded.

title: GoFundMe Scholarship
Description:: The GoFundMe Scholarship is available to undergraduate and graduate students.  You must create a new GoFundMe campaign or update an existing campaign using the hashtag #GFMScholarship in the campaign description, and raise money from at least 10 unique donors to be eligible for this award.
